pages.title: Description
pages.text: In these extremely cold conditions, you also need to focus on staying warm.

pages.title: Campfire
pages.text: $(6)Campfire $()was mentioned earlier, it provides a small amount of warmth and is good for warming up outside.

pages.title: Heater
pages.text: $(6)Heater $()is the best heating device, it can provide great warmth, but note that it is only effective when indoors, not recommended to carry it outside.$(br2)Give it a redstone signal to turn on the heating mode.

pages.title: Wotton Clothing
pages.text: The $(6)wool suit $()will provide you with good warmth, and it's a great choice in pre-development.

pages.title: Warm Liner
pages.text: $(6)Warm Liner $()is an advanced heating set that can be combined with $(6)armors $()to provide you with warmth by wearing it.$(br2)$(4)Note that it cannot be combined with $(6)wool suit$().

pages.title: Goopak Heat
pages.text: The $(6)Goopak Heat $()provides a time-limited warming effect after the $(2)right-click $()has been used.
